description: GHCup is an installer for the Haskell and core tools.
notes: For `ghc`, use `ghcup install ghc && ghcup set ghc`.
For `cabal`, use `ghcup install cabal && ghcup set cabal`.
* Use `cabal user-config update --augment "installdir: <<BIN_PATH>>"` to reset `cabal` binary destination path.
For `stack`, use `ghcup install stack && ghcup set stack`.
* Add "local-bin-path: <<BIN_PATH>>" to "$(stack path --stack-root)"to reset `stack` binary destination path.
